name: Bloodseeker
title: Strygwyr
lore: Strygwyr the Bloodseeker is a ritually sanctioned hunter, Hound of the Flayed Twins, charged with finding the blood of the Ancients.

bloodRite.name: Blood Rite
bloodRite.description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After a delay, enemies in the area are silenced and take damage.

bloodrage.name: Bloodrage
bloodrage.description: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage, increasing attack damage but causing them to take increased damage.

thirst.name: Thirst
thirst.description: Bloodseeker senses wounded heroes, gaining movement speed and attack damage for each enemy below half health.

rupture.name: Rupture
rupture.description: Causes an enemy's skin to rupture. Moving while ruptured causes damage based on distance traveled.
